name: Exorcist
description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
other_night_desc: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.
